name: Hallway Hindrance Endless Runner
description:
First unity project is a very basic endless runner, avoid the obstacles and use a variety of powerups to your advantage while listening to slightly menacing procedural tones.

Use left and right arrow keys to move.

Red stripe - decrease 5 points and 2 health

Green stripe - plus 5 points

Blue stripe - plus 1 health

Yellow stripe - Slow-motion 5 seconds

Purple stripe - Shrink size 10 seconds

Red box - decrease 100 health

White stripe boxes and any other obstacles will decrease 1 health.
